dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Today's slow as shite, innit...?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Hopefully there's a field contract waitin' for us at the Office. Beats having to sit on my arse all morning in there.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Enjoy your lunches, lads. I think I'll get a little shut-eye in the office.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: You wanna know why I've the long face when it's time to clock out? 'Cuz clockin' in again tomorrow sounds downright dreadful, that's why.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg:
X Corp. alloy upper crust excavation contract? Well, I suppose that's alright for some mindless grindin'...
Are they renting us their excavation gear?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
I equipped something to expand my eardrums' audible frequency or what have you, but they amplify all kinds of noise... it's gettin' real irritating.
Maybe I should swap 'em out for something else? But the cost... tsk, I suppose it'll work out somehow.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
Oi, clock. Wanna see something as neat as that burning head of yours?
I can move my forearms on a vertical axis. Human elbows can't do that, yeah? Have a gander, look~!

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
The MultiCrack Office accepts applications only from Fixers with prosthetics. Somethin' about how having prosthetic bodies helps dull the fear in combat, I think.
Well, that's exactly how a lot of 'em bite the dust. How are they to know where they're hurt without pain?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
Our business trip is to... huh, T Corp.? That's where that manor is. Well well well, now that I've found me a respectable career, I should—
... Haah, ain't worth it. Why the hell did I even think about going back to that bloody dreadful manor? There's... absolutely no reason for me to crawl back into that hole.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: ... Yaaawn.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Oi, hey... This one's dead! Really, did you seriously kick the bucket from getting a few holes punctured on your torso?

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Ooh...! Is it a field contract?

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Woah, hang on... I ain't fully charged yet.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Come on, out with it.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Outta my way! Let me at 'em first!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Now sit tight, you...

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Huh...?

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Oi, you dead already?

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Huh, didn't think this would kill me...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: I think this is how it's 'sposed to work... ah, I did it.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Oh bollocks, I fried my circuitry. Why'd you make me do this?

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: We did finish the contract but... hm, how should I put this? It ain't very... fulfilling...

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Right-o, I think our clients'll be right chuffed to see how much we've wrecked'em. Let's head back.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: If you ain't sure if it's okay to say something, then say nothing. I'm already irritated as it is from this botched contract...
